h2_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Buddha's Right Hand
content: Since it won't have too much health left, focus on avoiding its attacks and try to get around its face along the sides to score hits while out of range of many of its attacks, and be ready to dodge falling rocks if it begins shrieking or slamming into walls.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Webbed_Hollow-Middle_Hollow_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Webbed Hollow - Middle Hollow Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Buddha's Right Hand'.
The content is as follows:
Since it won't have too much health left, focus on avoiding its attacks and try to get around its face along the sides to score hits while out of range of many of its attacks, and be ready to dodge falling rocks if it begins shrieking or slamming into walls.
